title: Spectrum: Artilysin, contraception and Twitter Bot art
description: On this week’s show, it’s been 90 years since the first antibiotic, penicillin, was discovered. We’re going to take the occasion to talk about bacterial resistance, and what may be the future of antibiotics.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Wissenschaft, Podcast, Spectrum, Artilysine, Penizillin, multiresistente Keime
